a.n: Naples, city of keyboards - Giovanni de Macque

p.k: The harmonic experiments, radical chromaticism and stylistic freedom of Giovanni De Macques prove how exciting Neapolitan keyboard repertoire actually is. Baroque expert Jean-Marc Aymes chooses his favourite toccatas and canzonas from the keyboard oeuvre of this Franco-Flemish composer, whose employers included the Gesualdo family in Naples.
